item.description:
Turning the Key: "Anatomy of a Multi-Family Deal"


At last, the curtain is being pulled back on the anatomy of putting together a multi-family deal!

On Thursday, February 7th, at Turning the Key, locally based multi-family investor, Charles Dobens, will be going in depth on finding deals, putting them under contract, performing due diligence, closing and more!

In addition, Mr. Dobens will be working through the actual numbers on deal - live! - and going over how to analyze a deal to determine if it makes sense to move forward or not.

Of note, he'll be covering:

* How to find out about the HOT deals - before anyone else!
* A case study of a current deal being acquired
* The numbers in a deal - What to believe and what to question
* How to overcome the stigmas of investing in large multi-unit properties
* The 3 biggest signs it's time to walk - or run! - away from a deal
* If you've ever been afraid to look at the "big deals", or wanted to learn more about how to get started in multi-family investing, you won't want to miss this Turning the Key!



Pre-Register for Turning the Key and save $5.00!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Turning the Key: Anatomy of a Multi-Family Deal
